Text.Page: According to Prefect Neacal, the devas causing trouble in Oblivion Woods are the scouts from the Devan Empire. They were quiet for a while, but recently, they have armed themselves with new weapons and are once again threatening Crescentia. Neacal suggested that you talk to Chama, who knows more about the devas' mysterious leader than anyone else.

Let's talk about the Devas.

After the Devan Empire invaded and we pushed them back,
the devan forces scattered and many of them holed up in the Oblivion Woods.

They weren't particularly troublesome, but now they've got new weaponsâ€”quality stuff.

Clearly, they're organizing again, and we need to take out their leaders before they become more than just a nuisance."Who are their leaders?"

I sent my best scout to spy on them and find that out. His name is Chama, and he knows the devas better than anybody.

I'd like you to go help him. Head up the hillside path to the east there and look for Chama and his patrol.

Oh, I almost forgot, there's something you need to know about the weapon I just gave you.

To unlock its true potential, you'll want to enchant it.

Use Relic Fragments and gold to enchant it. You should enchant this one to +3 as soon as you can. As you grow in power, you'll find weapons that can be enchanted as high as +9!

==================================
Press key to open the Forge and use Relic Fragments and gold to enchant your weapon.
==================================
Oh, and take out some of those blasted Stonebeaks on the way to talk to Chama! The more of them you kill, the easier it'll be for us to hold this position.

Did Neacal send you? Good, because I can use the help.

Here. Take these supplies and suit up; it looks like your gear has seen better days.
